title: Animal
writer: Suresh Bandaru, Saurabh Gupta, Pranay Reddy Vanga
short_cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Anil Kapoor, Bobby Deol, Rashmika Mandanna, Triptii Dimri, Shakti Kapoor, Charu Shankar, Prithviraj, Prem Chopra, Suresh Oberoi, Siddhant Karnick
cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Anil Kapoor, Bobby Deol, Rashmika Mandanna, Triptii Dimri, Shakti Kapoor, Charu Shankar, Prithviraj, Prem Chopra, Suresh Oberoi, Siddhant Karnick
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Crime Movies, Action & Adventure Movies
desc: The hardened son of a powerful industrialist returns home after years abroad and vows to take bloody revenge on those threatening his father's life.
